name: Algoscale Technologies, Inc.
description:
Algoscale is an US incorporated, privately held boutique Big Data Analytics and Decision Science firm helping organizations derive valuable business insights from mountains of data through application of analytics and technology.
Our core competency is our exceptional expertise in building and customizing technology platforms to analyze any size of data backed by our ability to understand business requirements. Algoscale works across the Big Data Analytics value chain offering analysis, decision science and technology infrastructure under one roof.
